description: Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS) (Excludes requirements related to armament, R&D and R&O)
extraDescription: The Directorate of Naval Platform Systems (DNPS) requires one (1) Senior Professional Engineer (P.Eng) and two (2) Junior Professional Engineers (P.Eng) to provide both surface ship and submarine engineering support services
comments: This contract was competitively sourced. This contract is a call-up against a Public Services and Procurement Canada procurement tool.
